name: @milaidy/capacitor-gateway
description: Milaidy Gateway Plugin for Capacitor - WebSocket connection to Milaidy Gateway
author: Milaidy

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: cd ios && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme Plugin -destination generic/platform=iOS && cd ..
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check && npm run swiftlint -- lint
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write && npm run swiftlint -- lint --fix
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
scripts.build:docs: npm run clean && npm run docgen && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs

platformDetails.browser: Full WebSocket connectivity, RPC request/response, event streaming. No Bonjour/mDNS discovery on web.
platformDetails.node: Full support via Electron with native Bonjour/mDNS discovery and WebSocket connectivity
